channel.title: Suite repack problem
channel.description:
Okay my problem is title (background) changing I using suite cache editor and then i save new background it looks like this: [url=http://d.imagehost.org/view/0441/lolwtf][img]http://d.imagehost.org/0441/lolwtf.jpg[/img][/url]
And it should look like this: [url=http://b.imagehost.org/view/0033/title][img]http://b.imagehost.org/0033/title.jpg[/img][/url]
Idk problem but i think suite have this bug so maby samone know other cache editor :confused:
